mission.text:
Make life easier

description.text: A Swiss Army knife with over 6 years of experience working in social media üë•, fintech üíµ, big data üìä, efficiency engineering üöÄ, monitoring üìâ, and site reliability üöí

skills.comment: Can reverse a linked list in any of the following
skills.name: Languages

impact.title: Cuts costs
impact.description: Independently researched and executed projects saving over $1.2 million per year in infrastructure costs by reducing resource use of high-throughput applications, done in the time span of 2 months.

impact.title: Improves reliability
impact.description: Built functionality to incrementally deploy experiments to our hosts, reducing likelihood of incidents related to insufficiently validated A/B tests.

impact.title: Increases developer velocity
impact.description: Wrote a custom GitHub Action to allow internal teams to manage their alerting and monitoring through code.

impact.title: Handles massive scale
impact.description: Supports applications which service more than 4 million requests per second.

impact.title: Stress tests
impact.description: Lead a project to assess readiness of a service slated to be used by our entire fleet. Developed and executed load tests to proactively identify severe scale limitations, preventing the issues from occurring in production, saving millions of dollars in potential outages.

impact.title: Highly available
impact.description: Maintains 99.9% availability of all online applications comprising LinkedIn's targeting, ramping, and experimentation platform (T-REX).

impact.title: Builds web apps
impact.description: Created a browser registration funnel for our previously mobile-only application, reducing cost of user acquisition by 50% and paving the way for future investment into a cross-platform target for application development.

impact.title: Creative
impact.description: Built an internal Slack application for co-workers to show each other appreciation through coin emojis, dubbed "Earnin Coin", which went viral internally. Regularly reached 100s of weekly transactions. Included a real economy, a weekly leaderboard to celebrate high coin earners, and was consistently touted as making employees feel better about giving and receiving help.

impact.title: Innovates
impact.description: Developed a tool for improving application development and management (similar to Backstage.io), features included cataloging of internal applications, automated credential provisioning (ex. AWS, private package registries, etc.) for Docker builds and executions, configured by YAML, a CLI and API written in Python, integrated with GitHub, backed by a PostgreSQL database.

impact.title: Automates the hard stuff
impact.description: Created a Python tool to automate deployments our main monolith as well as other legacy C# applications, eliminating all deployment related issues. Included writing thorough documentation and training 30+ developers on tools use, which allowed engineers to confidently and safely deploy legacy code without fear of user impact.

impact.title: Improves performance
impact.description: Reduced average login times of our main application by ~300ms (25%).

impact.title: Security conscious
impact.description: Built a notification system which audited access logs for any reads on internal employee data.

impact.title: Independent
impact.description: Worked as a solo programmer delivering projects end-to-end.

impact.title: Works with real customers
impact.description: Built an automated job-dispatching application for an industrial and oil-field safety services company using Twilio and Node.js.

impact.title: Experience in multiple industries
impact.description: Worked on a team to create a health care-based chat application, with the goal of facilitating the secure sharing of patient information between clinics and physicians within Canada.

impact.title: Full-stack
impact.description: Developed the majority of the backend, as well as made significant contributions to the frontend (notifactions and chat functionality). Built using Angular and Node.js (leveraging WebSockets).

projects.name: prune
projects.description: A small Chrome extension to help you trim your garden of tabs.

projects.name: theo.lol
projects.description: My blog and showcase. Hosted on GitHub Pages and written in plain ol' JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It's small, it loads quickly, and it costs me $0.00.

projects.name: auxb0x
projects.description: A private website dedicated to playing my SoundCloud reposts and likes. Mainly built as an exercise in designing a frontend audio player and accompanying backend.

open-source.name: Atom
open-source.description: Added "Open in new tab" context-menu functionality to the find-and-replace package.

open-source.name: Review Board
open-source.description: Re-designed the Git diff viewer for mobile devices and implemented a minor bug fix as part of a UCOSP student project.

open-source.name: Linkerd
open-source.description: "What! Really? He's a Linkerd contributor?!" ... I made some CSS changes to the website and fixed some incorrect documentation.

open-source.name: Utterances
open-source.description: Forked and updated several components to eliminate a security vulnerability.
